summary: A realistic Dwarf Mesh, This adds a new race or replaces the nords
descriptionHtml:
Hey all.

This mod adds a new custom dwarf race. There is also a Nord Replacer Version

I have always wanted a realistic dwarf skeleton/mesh like in Warhammer or Lord of the rings. I always said to myself "why has no one created one?" so i took matters into my own hands and decided to create one. I opened Nif Scope and managed to get to grips of editing a skeleton. After hours of editing the skeleton to make it like a dwarf, I have finally decided to release it.

I have always wanted to see dwarves in Skyrim, so i thought the nords were the fitting race because of they are stubborn, proud and hate elves xD and of course the beards :p

I will create a non replacer and just a race. Just not yet. You can do it easily in the creation kit if you know what you are doing.

Of course, with every mod there is a bug or glitch. :p

Problems are:

- Some armour clipping issues, although not massively noticeable.
- When actors use furniture and furniture markers they will sometimes or always scale up.
- I have not found a way to increase the fatness of the legs yet. Hopefully i will

This Mod edits the nord race skeleton, so anything that does the same thing, there will be issues. Make sure to put this near the bottom of your load order!
author: Tomolyons
